content:
Successfully deployed node standardization fixes and CORS resolution to production.

**Completed Fixes:**
1. ✅ Y-Adapter now displays equipment name "003" instead of UUID "4b2d886a-5eda-49ad-9251-78e237e7fd41"
2. ✅ Wellside Gauge displays equipment name instead of UUID
3. ✅ Removed deprecated "Mark for Maintenance" from BaseEquipmentNode 3-dot menu
4. ✅ WellNode refactored to use BaseEquipmentNode pattern
5. ✅ Fixed CORS issue - databaseUtils.ts now routes all calls through proxy
6. ✅ Jobs loading successfully in production

**Production Verification:**
- Jobs page loads with "Connected to Turso" status
- BPX - Mohawk 2 job diagram displays correctly
- Y-Adapter shows "003" as requested
- SS Box, Starlink, Customer Computer all have 3-dot menus

**Architecture Changes:**
- src/utils/consolidated/databaseUtils.ts: Removed direct Turso client creation, now delegates to main client with proxy support
- src/components/nodes/YAdapterNode.tsx: Changed from displaying `data.equipmentId` to `data.equipmentName || data.equipmentId`
- src/components/nodes/WellsideGaugeNode.tsx: Same equipmentName fix
- src/components/nodes/BaseEquipmentNode.tsx: Removed handleMarkMaintenance function and menu option
- src/components/nodes/WellNode.tsx: Refactored to use BaseEquipmentNode wrapper with delete button support

**Deployment:**
- Commit 8d30fd7: Node standardization fixes
- Commit 7aacc46: CORS fix for database proxy
- Both deployed to production via Vercel
